ygData.subject: Membership restrictions?
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, m ladies. I recently happened to hear of your gatherings for discussion. I thought I might ask if you would welcome a man, such as myself, to
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, m'ladies.

I recently happened to hear of your gatherings for discussion. I thought
I might ask if you would welcome a man, such as myself, to participate.
In my travels of the lands of Norrath, it often seems the women I
encounter are much more likely to have the wit and intelligence for a
good conversation. So, ladies, might I participate, or am I invading your
sanctuary away from us uncouth men? I certainly would not be offended if
you would prefer that I depart.

I await your decision, ladies.

Iustus
Knight of the Holy Order of Mithaniel Marr
Tarrew Marr

[ooc: just let me know and I will remove myself from this list]
